'''Kornelia Stoiber''' is a [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Computer_scientist computer scientist] from [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austria Austria] who studied at a variety of universities and won a [https://ocg.at/fp-fh national IT incentive award]. In addition, she took courses in [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/design design] and playing the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/clarinet clarinet].<ref>{{Cite web
|title=Kornelia Stoiber on Beacons
|url=https://beacons.ai/kornelia.stoiber
|access-date=2024-10-05
|website=Beacons
|language=en
|url-status=live}}</ref>

'''Drafts:''' This user has created the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia Wikipedia] drafts 
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Wonderful_Drinks Draft:Wonderful Drinks], [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Hummingbird_Bike Draft:Hummingbird Bike], [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Ride_Colibri Draft:Ride Colibri], [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Organifarms Draft:Organifarms],
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Organic_Batteries Draft:Organic Batteries] and 
[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draft:Stalking_Safety Draft:Stalking Safety].

'''Books:''' This user is currently looking forward to the publication of the book [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patriot_(book) "Patriot: A Memoir"] by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexei_Navalny Alexei Navalny].

'''Videos:''' This user's favourite video is currently [https://youtube.com/watch?v=7aa_ik_UYTw "The 100,000 Qubit Quantum-Centric Supercomputer of 2033"] by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IBM_Research IBM Research].

'''Music:''' This user's favourite performance extracts are currently from the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Concerto_in_F_(Gershwin) Gershwin Concerto in F] [https://facebook.com/share/v/kHrnenbcALnmJwmb on Facebook] and [https://instagram.com/p/CXwNSXosiF_ on Instagram], performed by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yuja_Wang Yuja Wang] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Tilson_Thomas Michael Tilson Thomas] together with the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/London_Symphony_Orchestra London Symphony Orchestra].

More information is available on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia Wikipedia] user page [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User:KorneliaStoiber User:KorneliaStoiber] and on the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikiquote Wikiquote] user page [https://en.wikiquote.org/wiki/User:KorneliaStoiber User:KorneliaStoiber].
